name: Bienvenidos a la Matanza
description:
Bienvenidos a la matanza, is a SandBox game, In this demo you can explore the map and do some missions by changing clothes in the closet, note: this can reduce the fps, it is in development. I have armed it from scratch. single. There is a community on Facebook, called Bienvenidos a la Matanza, has 5,000 followers. 3 years ago I am developing it. without stopping, day and night.
The map was the most time I took, since from the textures to the 3d model was made from scratch, then proceeded to optimize it.
At the moment the demo is only in Spanish
FACEBOOK: 
https://www.facebook.com/Bienvenidosalamatanza
